title: Qatar $400M Plane Gift - 'Largest Foreign Bribe'
summary: Qatar offered Trump customized Boeing 747 worth $400 million. Ethics expert Norm Eisen: 'Largest foreign bribe to a president in American history.' Qatar controls significant energy resources and hosts major US military base.
